metadata.title: CVE-2012-3517 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in dns.c in Tor before 0.2.2.38 might allowremote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via vectorsrelated to failed DNS requests.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3517` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.2.3.22-rc-1
tor-geoipdb - 0.2.3.22-rc-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tor package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.3.22-rc-1').
